text: |Site proposal|Details| ||| |Indicative capacities|2,800 homes 8,500sqm commercial floorspace| |Phasing|2024-29, 2030-34| Tower Hamlets Local Plan 431 INTRODUCTIONSITE ALLOCATIONS Land uses, activities, and delivery z Development should consist of a mixed-use, residential-led scheme with a mix of retail, workspace, community and cultural uses, and provision of a secondary school. z Acceptable land uses include: – Residential (Class C3) – Town centre uses (Class E) – Community uses (Class F1/F2) z Required on-site infrastructure includes: – Secondary school – Strategic consolidated open space of minimum 1 hectare – Safeguarded bridge landing space for new crossings of the River Lea z Ensure the open space is designed and usable for sport and recreation and located adjacent to the River Lea, featuring the Leaway and water spaces. It should meet the minimum size of one hectare.
